definition[0]: someone who is not accepted as a member of a particular social group
example[0]: Iâ€™m an outsider, the only foreign woman in the group.
example[1]: To an outsider, the system seems complex and confusing.
definition[1]: someone who does not belong to a particular company or organization or who is not involved in a particular activity
example[2]: a political outsider who is running for governor
definition[2]: someone who does not seem to have much chance of winning a race or competition
example[3]: Last year he was a rank outsider for the title.
